Name: During Before And After COVID-19
About the game: During Before And After Covid-19 is a horror, Indie, survival, short game. Story *A very dangerous virus appeared in the hospital..this virus is human-made. *Events will be in a hospital building, that happened so many deaths for the same reason inside. *You will be Dr. Adam Adonis. that his daughter passed away in this building with a COVID-19 that takes place in it. *Issac Phil is a hospital manager who pushed to make this virus by someone, who finds contents for a medical vaccine but he disappeared for unknown reasons. Gameplay *Enter the Building and search for vaccine content and mix them to make the final result...but you have to find the virus first and inject yourself with it to see the side effects. *Vaccine Contents : 3 different types of medicines. *This game includes Jump Scare, Illusion, Enemies. Enemy: This Virus could cause genetic mutations that made Changes in the human complexion, more aggressive, so you are not alone there. *Inject yourself with the vaccine and escape.
